title: Mount Soklo
text:
Mount Soklo is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> on <a href="Mfangano%20Island">Mfangano Island</a> (Kenya), in <a href="Lake%20Victoria">Lake Victoria</a>, <a href="Africa">Africa</a>. The mountain has a river, as well as a spring that provides <a href="drinking%20water">drinking water</a>. It has a generally cool <a href="climate">climate</a>.
Mountain residents are mostly farmers who plant <a href="cassava">cassava</a>, <a href="sugarcane">sugarcane</a>, <a href="maize">maize</a>, and other staple crops. There is a fishing industry on the mountain, and burning of <a href="charcoal">charcoal</a> is also prevalent.
